messages.subject: For those who may be interested
messages.msgSnippet: I posted the first two chapters of MIRROR, MIRROR, the novel I recently finished that features the Shinsengumi (they re not in the opening pages though) and if
messages.messageBody:
I posted the first two chapters of MIRROR, MIRROR, the novel I
recently finished that features the Shinsengumi (they're not in the
opening pages though) and if anyone would like to take a peek and pop
a comment on my blog that would be great. I'm very interested in what
the average reader thinks in terms of are you intrigued enough to want
to find out what happens next.

You can check it out here.

http://www.barbarasheridan.net/mirror-mirror.htm

End of self promotional spam ^_^

Barbara Sheridan
